Author: daniriddle
Text: yeah, exactly. and then i cry every day because i just feel like i’m too ugly for him to want to have sex with. you too! 💕

Author: rainesaway
Text: i totally understand this. my boyfriend recently said he couldn’t “keep up” with my sex drive (lol) but then i relapsed and started restricting and counting calories again and it went down. i think for me it’s probably less energy because less food/bad body image/thinking about food and not sex. it sucks, and i hope you feel better soon. 💕 stay safe !
